categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This Jedi was a young Human male Padawan who trained at the Almas Academy. He trained alongside Masters Lanius Qel-Bertuk and Kirlocca.
Trained in the ways of the light side, this Padawan was described black hair, light tan skin, and brown eyes. A wielded a light-blue lightsaber.
